motto: Our services end when you arrive at your destination.

hero.title: Your Journey, Perfected
hero.subtitle: Seamless orchestration of your global journeys. We bridge the gap between elite travelers and world-class airlines, ensuring punctuality, privacy, and precision.

highlights.title: Global Precision
highlights.description: Real-time synchronization with international carriers for absolute itinerary accuracy.

highlights.title: Intelligent Concierge
highlights.description: Automated, context-aware alerts for departures, boarding gates, and document validity.

highlights.title: Arrival Intelligence
highlights.description: Comprehensive destination insights, from climatic conditions to terminal logistics.

services.title: Strategic Booking Management
services.description: Centralized oversight of complex itineraries across multiple carriers and alliances.

services.title: Proactive Communication
services.description: Immediate dissemination of schedule adjustments and critical travel advisories.

services.title: Identity Protection
services.description: Bank-grade security protocols for managing sensitive travel documentation.

steps.title: Secure Onboarding
steps.description: Your profile is established within our encrypted agency network.

steps.title: Strategic Monitoring
steps.description: Our systems continuously validate your itinerary against global flight data.

steps.title: Executive Reporting
steps.description: You receive precise, actionable intelligence exactly when needed.

about.title: The Agency Standard
about.subtitle: D.Narai Enterprise is the premier infrastructure for modern travel management.

sections.heading: Our Mandate
sections.body: To provide an uncompromising layer of intelligence and support between the discerning traveler and the global aviation network.

sections.heading: Our Capabilities
sections.body: We deploy advanced tracking algorithms and secure data vaults to ensure your journey is managed with the precision of a private flight operation.

sections.heading: Our Promise
sections.body: We remain vigilant until you have safely arrived. Excellence is not a goal; it is our baseline.
